XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle local/smartmedia to track smart media conversions

TABLE.NAME: local_smartmedia_conv
TABLE.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle local/smartmedia to track smart media conversions.

FIELD.NAME: itemhash
FIELD.COMMENT: complete file path sha1 hash - unique for each file

FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: The context id of the source asset

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: Full name of the component owning the area

FIELD.NAME: filearea
FIELD.COMMENT: Like "coursefiles". "submission", "intro" and "content" (images and swf linked from summaries), etc.

FIELD.NAME: itemid
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional - some plugin specific item id (eg. forum post, blog entry or assignment submission, user id for user files)

FIELD.NAME: filename
FIELD.COMMENT: The full Unicode name of this file (case sensitive) - some chars are not allowed though

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The processing status of the record.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of when the record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of when record was last modified

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp of when record processing was completed

INDEX.NAME: resource
INDEX.COMMENT: Index for the components that make up a plugin file href.
